terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.acceptance_content: By accessing and using this application, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.account_content: When you create an account with us, you must provide information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times.
terms.privacy_content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the Service.
terms.payment_content: Some services may require payment. You agree to provide current, complete, and accurate purchase and account information.
terms.liability_content: In no event shall Loqme, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, punitive, consequential or special damages.
terms.contact_content: Questions about the Terms of Service should be sent to us at support@laghmeh.app.
terms.footer_content: By continuing to use our service, you agree to these terms and conditions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.overview_content: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you use our service.
privacy.data_collection_content: We collect personal information you provide to us such as name, phone number, email address, and usage data.
privacy.data_usage_content: We use the personal information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services and communicate with you.
privacy.data_sharing_content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent.
privacy.security_content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your information.
privacy.cookies_content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information.
privacy.user_rights_content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights.
privacy.contact_content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@laghmeh.app.
privacy.footer_content: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information.

support.title: Support
support.welcome_subtitle: Our support team is here to assist you with any questions or issues you may have.

support.bug_reports_desc: Report issues or bugs you've encountered
support.account_issues_desc: Problems with your account or login
support.response_time_desc: We typically respond within 24 hours during business days.
support.email_copied_hint: Email address copied! You can now paste it in your email app.

fix_result.title: Fix Result
fix_result.description: Include details like portion, size, or ingredients to help us make accurate changes!

describe_food.title: Describe Food
describe_food.subtitle: Tell us about your meal
describe_food.description: Describe what you ate in detail and we'll analyze the nutrition for you
describe_food.placeholder: Example: I had a large bowl of chicken Caesar salad with croutons and parmesan cheese, plus a slice of garlic bread
describe_food.tips: Be specific about portions, cooking methods, and ingredients. Mention brands if relevant. Include sides and drinks.

testimonials.name: Mona
testimonials.text: I used to have to type in every single food item with calorie counter apps, it was really exhausting. I installed Loqme, just took a photo and it told me everything. Much more accurate than I thought!

testimonials.name: Niloofar
testimonials.text: I always forgot to log my meals and my diet would fall apart. But with Loqme everything is automated. I just take a photo and see my progress every day, that's what keeps me going.

testimonials.name: Nima
testimonials.text: After a month of using Loqme, seeing my progress on the chart really made me happy. Being able to see your journey is the biggest motivation.

testimonials.name: Pedram
testimonials.text: The best part of Loqme for me is the advanced chart. I can see exactly how many percent closer I got to my weight goal during the week.

testimonials.name: Ramin
testimonials.text: I feel like I have a little coach in my pocket! Every time I eat a new food, Loqme analyzes it and guides me on how to eat more balanced.

testimonials.name: Elnaz
testimonials.text: The fact that it recognizes Iranian food is amazing, Loqme even correctly identified stew and rice ðŸ˜… Very accurate and practical.

testimonials.name: Mitra
testimonials.text: I was always looking for a simple way to understand what I'm eating without calculations and searching. Loqme is exactly that. I feel like finally an app designed for real people!
